data.title: Death of Tamara Brooks, 70, Robs Theodore Bikel of Treasured Companion
data.meta_description: Leonard Fein writes about his friend Theodore Bikel, iconic for his portrayal of Tevye in Fiddler on the Roof, and the death of his wife and companion Tamara Brooks. Tamara, in her absence, will remain an enduring presence. And Theo, God willing, will do exactly what she so certainly would have wanted - continue to do good, love peace and seek it out, fight the good fight, sing the good song.
